data.text:
An advanced manufacturing centre for low-cost production in China

Founded in 2004, Meggitt Xiamen specialises in the manufacture of high precision products, particularly for aerospace, industrial and health care markets. These include electronic components and assemblies, accelerometers, polymer seals and ground fuelling equipment.

The company is part of the international engineering group Meggitt PLC. We have a team of over 250 people and a modern, 10,000 m2 site, based conveniently close to Xiamen International Airport.

High technology manufacturing

We manufacture a broad range of products supporting customers operating across many industries. We hold a wide range of approvals including AS9100, NADCAP, OHSAS 18001 and ISO14001.

We are also more than just a manufacturing facility and can help you establish markets and/or develop your own supply chains in China.

We are very proud to be one of the first Meggitt sites to exit Meggitt Production System bronze stage demonstrating our commitment to business excellence. Our team work very hard to maintain the highest levels of operational performance and are committed to providing unrivalled customer service and support.

Ethics

Meggitt Xiamen uphold the principles of doing business the right way and will not tolerate behaviour from any of our team, or anybody we do business with that conflicts with our ethical standards and/or applicable laws and regulations.

Here are links to Meggitt’s ethics and business conduct guide:

Ethics – English

Ethics – Chinese

About our parent company – Meggitt PLC

Headquartered in the United Kingdom, Meggitt PLC is an international group operating in North America, Europe and Asia. Known for its specialised extreme environment engineering, Meggitt is a world leader in aerospace, defence and energy. We employ approximately 11,000 people at over 40 manufacturing facilities and regional offices worldwide.

There are five operating divisions:

Meggitt Aircraft Braking Systems

Meggitt Control Systems

Meggitt Equipment Group

Meggitt Polymers & Composites

Meggitt Sensing Systems

By cooperating both within and across divisions, we can provide a comprehensive portfolio of products and solutions for any new programme.
